headline: PPG recognized in Newsweek’s America’s Most Responsible Companies list for fifth consecutive year
summary: PITTSBURGH, December 09, 2024--PPG (NYSE:PPG) today announced that it has been named to Newsweek magazine’s America’s Most Responsible Companies list for the fifth consecutive year. The top 2,000 public companies were considered for the 2025 list, which recognizes the 600 most responsible companies in the U.S. PPG ranks no. 110 overall and no. 8 in the Materials and Chemicals industry category.
